results.name: Triangle by columns: (1, 2, 3,...) in each column interleaved with (0, 1, 2,...)zeros. Columns >1 shifted down twice.
comment: Row sums of n-th row = A065608(n+1).
formula: Triangle, left border = (1, 2, 3,...). Each successive column is shifted down twice from previous column and interleaved with k zeros.
